name: This Halloween Knight
description:
A strange curse has fallen over the town of Samhain, Massachusetts on Halloween night. Now transformed into real versions of their Halloween costumes, the townspeople roam the streets as terrifying and strange monsters, ushering in chaos wherever they go. Our hero, 13-year old Arthur Ironheart is mysteriously spared from this curse, and instead gains the ability to transform into any costume he puts on.

Determined to rescue his girlfriend, Arthur, together with his friends and unlikely allies, embarks on an epic quest to free the town from the curse. Facing dangers and absurdities along the way, Arthur and his allies will gain new costumes, granting them even more skills and abilities to help free the transformed townspeople.

Begin Arthur's journey today by downloading our demo; and consider supporting us on Patreon or though donations.  Follow us on Twitter (@THK_DevTeam) as well for any future updates. 

Important Note: 

The game will not run if it is not unzipped. To unzip, open the folder in file explorer, click extract at the top, save to your computer, then open the unzipped file and click the file marked: 'game',  to start the demo.
